Name: Super Hoopers
About the game: Super Hoopers is a basketball-themed game featuring three playable characters where their purpose is to carefully aim and throw the ball in order to score awesome basketball throws and trick shots. Set your aim ready into target and score in every way possible, lucky bouncy shots? no problem, find your own way to throw that ball into the hoop! Make use of springs, force pads, walls or floor, anything counts! Watch out for the obstacles and enemies that might interfere in your way. Some red malicious mannequins are out everywhere keeping you from scoring, settings traps in order to make you fail, will you be able to beat them? Three awesome characters: Cameron, Ryan and Rachel are waiting for you! each with their own themed-scenarios and a sweet short ending sequence. Choose between journeys and discover each level. There's an object to collect in every level, it can be a star, a key or a heart, depending on the character, will you be able to collect the item in every level?
